SEARCH
Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.controller.dashboard

Klasse DashboardController

java.lang.Object
org.com.controller.dashboard.DashboardController
public class DashboardController extends Object
Controller class for managing the dashboard UI, handling user interactions with checkboxes for various statistics and type filters, and updating the displayed charts.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
umut

    private void
    setupTypeCheckBoxListeners()
    Sets up listeners for the type-related checkboxes (Movie, Anime, Series).
    private void
    updateDashboard()
    Updates the dashboard by clearing the current charts and adding new ones based on the selected strategies.

      public void setDashboardModel(DashboardModel dashboardModel)

      Initializes the maps that associate types, states, and statistic strategies with their corresponding checkboxes.

    • handleTypeCheckBoxAction

      private void handleTypeCheckBoxAction(Type type, boolean isSelected)
      Handles the action of a type checkbox being selected or deselected.
      Parameter:
      type - the type associated with the checkbox
      isSelected - whether the checkbox is selected or not
